steps.name: Input Files
steps.description:
Open your files (.edf, .eeg or .sts) and select the montage and channels you want to detect the slow waves on.

The .sig file is also needed for Stellate format.  The whole NATUS subject folder is also needed for the .eeg format.

steps.name: Non valid events
steps.description:
Select events that disable the slow wave detection i.e. artifact.

Start by selecting one PSG or multiple files (with the ctrl key pressed), then select an event group or name.

Be aware that the files must still be highlighted in the GUI to apply the 'Select All' option.

steps.name: Detection Criterias
steps.description: Select the criterias that will be used to detect sleep slow waves

steps.name: Output Files
steps.description: Select the folder path to indicate where the output files will be saved.

list.name: Hours and Cycles
list.description: Define the maximum number of hours and cycles to report.

parameters.name: parameters

alias.tooltip: List of aliases separated by a semicolon(;) character

file_selection_only.tooltip: Set it to 1 if you only need to select a file and not its montages and channels.
